parties.name: Brightcast LLC
parties.address: 2699 Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 200, Hermosa Beach, CA 90254

offerAndAcceptance.offer: The Company offers the engagement to provide media buying services.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: The Client accepts this offer, subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties hereby confirm that there is a meeting of minds based on the terms outlined herein.

consideration.description: Revenue share based on ad revenues derived from Oath.
consideration.value: The Client shall pay the Company 85% of Paid Search Revenues.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties hereby confirm their intention to create legal relations as evidenced by their signatures on this Agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: This Agreement pertains to a legal engagement in media buying services.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: The subject matter of this Agreement is media buying services.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: The duration of the performance of services is indefinite until terminated by either party.

contract.consent: Consent to this Agreement is implied through the mutual agreement of the parties to the outlined terms.

durationAndTermination.duration: This Agreement is indefinite until terminated by either party with a 30-day written notice.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Immediate termination may occur upon breach of this Agreement.
